name: antsama
text: Every strip that Ray does his "bloo bloo bloooo" cry in gets a 5.

name: zefiel
text: I can only but agree with Batman from the animated series.

name: fidget
text: I can't not laugh when he breaks that shit out.

name: c_dizzle
text: Blubbering Ray = goodness.

name: andyk
text: i agree... the bloo bloo cry is always a winner.

name: untilyouaresonude
text: True, but any "bloo bloo bloo" is only secondary to that panel where he's got the "jelly feeling". That makes me giggle like a five year old on coke.

name: nessotron
text: Would this be a five year old intoxicated with Coca-Cola or Cuban snow?

name: untilyouaresonude
text:
Well, Phillipe's "coke binge" was him stealing one of Teodor's cokes to write his article, with hillarious results. I'm opting for that one, as opposed to a depressing one.

Also, you have an amazing avatar. If only there were a way to depict him eating a scotch egg.

name: nessotron
text: Eating a Scotch egg and candidly explaining to women how he will give them an orgasm would make it really hot.

name: greenkoolayd
text: columbian?

name: saint
text: the look on his face in the second-to-last panel is unbelievable. that's how my uncle looked all the time after he had a stroke.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: O-neg!

name: nutmeg
text: hey I HAVE O-NEG! RAY YOU ARE WELCOME TO ALL MY O-NEG!

name: nutmeg
text:
who lamed my blood type?
....blatant typism. fucking typists.

name: catgrl131
text: I reeeeeeeeeeeeally hope that pun was on purpose.

name: nutmeg
text: it was intentional. you can relax, joke police. christ.

name: catgrl131
text: Man, don't get all hostile on me! I meant in in a "Haha, that is a pretty awesome pun. If it was intentional, that dude deserves my chubby (which has been given)" way, not in a "That had better be an intentional pun, because if not, I will hate this dude with every fiber of my being for wasting my time" way. Understood?

name: nutmeg
text: OKAY! bffs?

name: tekende
text: catgrl131 has got some wicked sack!

name: atticusonline
text: you better believe catgrl31 has a wicked sack.

name: zapatos
text: I am giving her a chubby for her wicked sack.  Her wickedly putting me in jail if I talk to her for more than an hour sack.

name: boredom_man
text: Perhaps they feared you were offering music by that horrible goth band? Truly, their tortured attempts at harmony have sullied the reputation of your universally appropriate blood.

name: nurdbot
text:
NOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!
Yes! God, I love being reminded how awesomely hilarious this arc was.

name: petitegitan
text: Hopefully someone loves me enough to chew my food someday.

name: riazm
text: Beef is furious as he calls out Ray's bullshit medical knowledge. Classic.

name: mat4900
text: I like the way when Ray gets out of the car his attitude suddenly changes, sticking his tongue out and looking all chilled...

name: tripperday
text: Dude just shakes it off.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Every single line in this comic is hilarious. Absolute perfection.

name: mcwee
text: Blubbering => automatic 5

name: dezufnocosem
text: because any other shape could twist and fall down the hole?

name: connellingus
text: I think there was an Encyclopedia Brown where a kid was trying to market spurious square manhole covers and Encyclopedia reasoned that they wouldn't work for this reason.

name: nigelchaos
text: Hahaha. Man. I thought I was the only one who ever read those books... well.. I was the only one I knew.

name: jackparsons
text: There is much real science here, but I will only offer: some of the guys who use the manholes are obese, and have gotten stuck in the unround experiments.

name: killerlimpet
text: In reality, manholes come in a variety of shapes.

name: tronwell
text:
many shapes AND many forms:
[IMGS OFF]

name: rizzle
text: If you read through that options list too many times... you will be creeped out

name: aelindil
text: Wait, this is what passes for reality these days?

name: johnnyc
text: Yes, but why come?

name: killerlimpet
text: Because it feels good and reduces stress.

name: killerlimpet
text:
The "real" answer to Ray's question is that circles can't fall through their own diagonal, whereas a square or a triangle can- a square manhole has a diagonal greater than a square manhole cover's side.
It is often claimed that circles are the only such shape, but this claim is false- Reuleaux triangles , for example, have the same property, and this is claimed as a real-world example, although it looks all the world like a rounded off triangle to me.

Incidentally, Reuleaux triangles have the property that they can be used to drill square holes; go to www.howround.com and click on "Applications of non-roundedness".

The Real reason for primarily round manholes is still disputed.

name: zaratustra
text: Obviously, manhole covers are round so they can fit the manholes.

name: jujubeesforjesus
text: If the covers are round, there is no way they could fall through the hole, no matter how they are placed, as the radius of the cover will never be able to slip through the hole, thus stopping the horrible deaths of many a municipal city worker and giant mutant sewer rat.

name: mattylite
text: 2 Chubbies for 2 correct answers.

name: lunchbox
text: They had that on Mr. Wizard. It's the only bit I can remember, next to the episode talking about camera flashes.

name: sp1derbaby
text: They had the horrible deaths of many a municipal city worker on Mr. Wizard?

name: gkiyo
text: Check out Cornelius' raised eyebrow in panel 9.  Perfect, like the rest of the arc.

name: philosophe
text: "Why come?" I say to people. They glance at me weird.

name: heavymetaljesus
text: A comment left by heavymetaljesus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by NDCaesar, snoozebar, Magb, Zem, anitrophaeron)

name: deusoma
text: I like that the tears are just constantly pouring down Ray's face, like an anime character who's crying but not really upset, like they just got turned down by a hot girl or punched in the face or something. In Achewood, it really gets across the senseless depression of the Volvo of Despair.

name: mountaindewtab
text: he got out of the car and was better.

name: thegrayhoodie
text: What better sound to describe someone blobbering than BLOO BLA ABLOO BLOO.  I submit there is none better.  ABLOO.

name: epicurus
text: I can't help but love Ray and Beef's anger and sadness over completely inconsequential issues. Their back and forth reminds me of high school. Ah, those days!

name: tekende
text: "I'm LEAVING! I HATE you!" makes this strip a five for me.

name: harletron
text: I love that Beef repeats himself when he's flipping out, especially when he's yelling at ray about his medical drama addictions.

name: direhaggis
text:
So in the span of several minutes, Cornelius is getting senile, getting scared and napping in traffic, committing suicide, peeing on himself, then looping back around to full-blown dementia.

Logic cannot escape the Volvo of Despair's event horizon.

name: spectre
text: The warm, tingly jelly-like feeling is the same one you get when the NIN album finishes.

name: heccibiggs
text: Oh no, I watch too much medical dramas. I'm doomed.

name: st_elmos_fire
text: If I ever somehow end up taking care of people in a nursing home I will end up quoting Ray all the time, all "I'll change your pants, I'll chew your food! Cause LIFE'S A BITCH!" at the old people . . . I'd probably get fired reaaal fast.

name: red-barchetta
text: Anyone who didn't 5 this strip needs to go.

name: severide
text:
OH I AM YOUR MOM AND I JUST TOOK YOU TO SCHOOL IN THE VOLVO OF DESPAIR

SAY IT

name: mrectomy
text: Medical dramas are hell of gay.

name: tonyhighwind
text: Police dramas, too.  I will never be able to watch Law & Order.

name: nonanon
text:
Oh Christ, I forgot he actually blubbers in this arc.

I love Achewood.

name: mustakrakesh
text: Beef seems to be holding up to the effects of the volvo better than Ray.

name: hendetta
text: Whoa, Beef! Don't drive that thing! You're completely SAD AS HELL.

name: carlyle
text: Tee hee!
